rooms.description: North-facing entrance hall with Vastu-aligned entry and reception area
Open living area incorporating Chettinad-style elements with intricate detailing and natural light from north-facing windows.
Adjacent dining area with seating arrangement optimized for a family of four and Vastu-aligned positioning.
Modern kitchen with Chettinad aesthetics, integrated appliances and adequate ventilation following Vastu guidelines.
Dedicated servant's quarters designed for optimal privacy and functionality with access to a service corridor.

Private gym integrated within the ground floor for convenient use and designed with natural light to boost energy.
